Workflow.Name: [Operation Type] Risk Application Update
Workflow.Description: This flow triggers when the Risk Application selection is changed in an Operation Type. It will lookup up the related Entity Risk records and update what Risk Application selections have been made. From this the formula columns in Operation Activity Risk Scores will be updated specifying what calculation to use for the Risk Score.
